Item Description The AP-204 combines traditional styling with the high-performance feel you expect from an ESP bass, all at a price you can afford. A bolt-on design at classic 34” scale that’s great for any kind of music, the AP-204 has been updated for 2018 with new finishes — Black Satin and Natural Satin — and now feature a cool 1-ply pickguard. The AP-204 features a mahogany body, a comfortable thin U-shaped maple neck, and roasted jatoba fingerboard with 21 extra-jumbo frets. A sonically versatile bass, the AP-204 includes a set of ESP Designed pickups, with active 2-band EQ.
